flag.name: wxAUI_NB_DEFAULT_STYLE
flag.description: Defined as wxAUI_NB_TOP | wxAUI_NB_TAB_SPLIT | wxAUI_NB_TAB_MOVE | wxAUI_NB_SCROLL_BUTTONS | wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_ON_ACTIVE_TAB.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_TAB_SPLIT
flag.description: Allows the tab control to be split by dragging a tab.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_TAB_MOVE
flag.description: Allows a tab to be moved horizontally by dragging.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_TAB_EXTERNAL_MOVE
flag.description: Allows a tab to be moved to another tab control.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_TAB_FIXED_WIDTH
flag.description: With this style, all tabs have the same width.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_SCROLL_BUTTONS
flag.description: With this style, left and right scroll buttons are displayed.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_WINDOWLIST_BUTTON
flag.description: With this style, a drop-down list of windows is available.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_BUTTON
flag.description: With this style, a close button is available on the tab bar.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_ON_ACTIVE_TAB
flag.description: With this style, the close button is visible on the active tab.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_ON_ALL_TABS
flag.description: With this style, the close button is visible on all tabs.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_TOP
flag.description: With this style, tabs are drawn along the top of the notebook.

flag.name: wxAUI_NB_BOTTOM
flag.description: With this style, tabs are drawn along the bottom of the notebook.

type.name: EVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CLOSE
type.description: A page is about to be closed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CLOSE event.

type.name: EVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
type.description: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

type.name: EVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
type.description: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

type.name: EVT_AUINOTEBOOK_BUTTON
type.description: The window list button has been pressed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_AUINOTEBOOK_BUTTON event.

type.name: EVT_AUINOTEBOOK_BEGIN_DRAG
type.description: Dragging is about to begin. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_AUINOTEBOOK_BEGIN_DRAG event.

type.name: EVT_AUINOTEBOOK_END_DRAG
type.description: Dragging has ended. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_AUINOTEBOOK_END_DRAG event.

type.name: EVT_AUINOTEBOOK_DRAG_MOTION
type.description: Emitted during a drag and drop operation. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_AUINOTEBOOK_DRAG_MOTION event.

type.name: EVT_AUINOTEBOOK_ALLOW_DND
type.description: Whether to allow a tab to be dropped. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_AUINOTEBOOK_ALLOW_DND event. This event must be specially allowed.

bitmap.description: Bitmap shown alongside the label (default: none).

bool.name: selected
bool.description: Is the page selected initially (only one page can be selected; default: 0)?
